report.name: lstfact

userParameter.name: P_FILTRE
userParameter.comment: Sert à afficher les critères de selection

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select F.NUMFACT, F.TYPFACT, F.SOCFACT, F.DATFACT, decode(F.TYPFACT, 'A', (-1 * F.FMONTHT), F.FMONTHT ) as fmontht, F.FENRCOMPTA, F.FREGCOMPTA, F.FPROVSEGL1, F.FPROVSEGL2, L.LNUM, substr(F.FDEPPOLE,1,17) FDEPPOLE , substr( SI.LIBDSG,1,17) LIBDSG, F.FMODREGLT, L.LMOISPREST, L.LCODCOMPTA, L.IDENT, substr(R.RNOM,1,10) RNOM, DECODE(f.fmodreglt,8,8,1) type_huit from Facture F, Ligne_fact L, Contrat C, Ressource R, Societe S, Struct_info SI where F.SOCFACT = L.SOCFACT and F.TYPFACT = L.TYPFACT and F.DATFACT = L.DATFACT and F.NUMFACT = L.NUMFACT and F.SOCCONT = C.SOCCONT and F.NUMCONT = C.NUMCONT and F.CAV = C.CAV and F.SOCFACT = S.SOCCODE and F.FDEPPOLE = SI.CODSG and L.IDENT = R.IDENT and F.NUMCONT is not null -- and F.FMODREGLT <> 8 &P_WHERE union all select F.NUMFACT, F.TYPFACT, F.SOCFACT, F.DATFACT, decode(F.TYPFACT, 'A', (-1 * F.FMONTHT), F.FMONTHT ) as fmontht, F.FENRCOMPTA, F.FREGCOMPTA, F.FPROVSEGL1, F.FPROVSEGL2, L.LNUM, substr(F.FDEPPOLE,1,17) FDEPPOLE , SI.LIBDSG, F.FMODREGLT, L.LMOISPREST, L.LCODCOMPTA, L.IDENT, substr(R.RNOM,1,10) RNOM, DECODE(f.fmodreglt,8,8,1) type_huit from Facture F, Ligne_fact L, Ressource R, Societe S, Struct_info SI where F.SOCFACT = L.SOCFACT and F.TYPFACT = L.TYPFACT and F.DATFACT = L.DATFACT and F.NUMFACT = L.NUMFACT and F.SOCFACT = S.SOCCODE and F.FDEPPOLE = SI.CODSG and L.IDENT = R.IDENT and F.NUMCONT is null &P_WHERE2 order by type_huit, 3, 14 desc, 11, 15, 16, 1, 5 desc
dataSource.comment: Deux selects : s1 union s2 s1 : rammerne les factures avec contrat (celles qu'ont un contrat, leur filiale est compara au filiale d'utilisateur) s2 : les factures sans contrat

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select: select F.NUMFACT, F.TYPFACT, F.SOCFACT, F.DATFACT, decode(F.TYPFACT, 'A', (-1 * F.FMONTHT), F.FMONTHT ) as fmontht_dd, F.FENRCOMPTA, F.FREGCOMPTA, F.FPROVSEGL1, F.FPROVSEGL2, L.LNUM, substr(F.FDEPPOLE,1,17) FDEPPOLE , substr( SI.LIBDSG,1,17) LIBDSG, F.FMODREGLT, L.LMOISPREST, L.LCODCOMPTA, L.IDENT, substr(R.RNOM,1,10) RNOM, DECODE(f.fmodreglt,8,8,1) type_huit from Facture F, Ligne_fact L, Contrat C, Ressource R, Societe S, Struct_info SI where F.SOCFACT = L.SOCFACT and F.TYPFACT = L.TYPFACT and F.DATFACT = L.DATFACT and F.NUMFACT = L.NUMFACT and F.SOCCONT = C.SOCCONT and F.NUMCONT = C.NUMCONT and F.CAV = C.CAV and F.SOCFACT = S.SOCCODE and F.FDEPPOLE = SI.CODSG and L.IDENT = R.IDENT and F.NUMCONT is not null and F.FMODREGLT = 8 &P_WHERE union all select F.NUMFACT, F.TYPFACT, F.SOCFACT, F.DATFACT, decode(F.TYPFACT, 'A', (-1 * F.FMONTHT), F.FMONTHT ) as fmontht_dd, F.FENRCOMPTA, F.FREGCOMPTA, F.FPROVSEGL1, F.FPROVSEGL2, L.LNUM, substr(F.FDEPPOLE,1,17) FDEPPOLE , SI.LIBDSG, F.FMODREGLT, L.LMOISPREST, L.LCODCOMPTA, L.IDENT, substr(R.RNOM,1,10) RNOM, DECODE(f.fmodreglt,8,8,1) type_huit from Facture F, Ligne_fact L, Ressource R, Societe S, Struct_info SI where F.SOCFACT = L.SOCFACT and F.TYPFACT = L.TYPFACT and F.DATFACT = L.DATFACT and F.NUMFACT = L.NUMFACT and F.SOCFACT = S.SOCCODE and F.FDEPPOLE = SI.CODSG and L.IDENT = R.IDENT and F.NUMCONT is null and F.FMODREGLT = 8 &P_WHERE2 order by type_huit, 3, 14 desc, 11, 15, 16, 1, 5 desc

function.name: afterpform
rtrimetoile
beforereport
f_cfraisformattrigger
f_filialeformattrigger
f_fprovsegl3formattrigger
f_fprovsegl4formattrigger
b_3formattrigger
f_total_soc1formattrigger
b_6formattrigger
cf_1formula
